title: Linear Search: Predicate Version
description: Implement `findIndex(arr, predicate)` that returns the first index where `predicate(arr[i])` is true, or -1 if none match.

easy: Pseudo-code: for i in [0..n): if predicate(arr[i]) return i; return -1;
medium: Call predicate with each element and check if it returns true
Return the index of the first match
hard: Return -1 if no element satisfies the predicate
